sentences.sentence: You covered wedding I grasped the cassocks!
sentences.translation: 你披上婚纱我披了袈裟！

sentences.sentence: When you put the marriage gauze of love, I will clothe monks of cassocks.
sentences.translation: 当你穿上爱情的婚纱，我将披上僧侣的袈裟。

sentences.sentence: As he made his cassocks last a long while, and did not wish to have it noticed, he never went out in the town without his wadded purple cloak.
sentences.translation: 由于他的道袍穿得太久了，却又不愿被别人察觉，因此他进城就不得不套上那件紫棉袍。
